Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Traffic.Traff: When checked, the mod tool bindings will mimic vanilla key bindings
Keybinding used for applying the tool action, e.g.: click to select intersection (default: Left Mouse Button)
Keybinding used for canceling the tool action, e.g.: click to reset intersection selection (default: Right Mouse Button)
Keybinding used for toggling the Lane Connector tool
Keybinding used for toggling the Priorities tool
Keybinding is used when intersection is selected by Lane Connector Tool
Keybinding is used when intersection is selected by Lane Connector Tool
Keybinding is used when intersection is selected by Lane Connector Tool
Keybinding is used when intersection is selected by Lane Connector Tool
Keybinding used for toggling between Priority tool display modes (Lane Group ⇆ Lane)
Resets all bindings to the mod defaults
Sets the language used in the mod

Disabling the option will allow for selecting different language than currently set for the game interface (including not supported by the game).
When enabled, the mod language will match selected game language
Mod current version
Mod version with the commit ID
Opens the mod GitHub repository for the current version
While in-game, it will remove all custom lane connections
Options.WARNING[Traffic.Traffic.Mod.ModS: Are you sure you want to remove all custom lane connections?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Traffic.Traff: While in-game, it will remove all custom priority settings
Options.WARNING[Traffic.Traffic.Mod.ModS: Are you sure you want to remove all custom priority settings?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Traffic.Traff: The width of the outline when feedback overlay is rendered, e.g.: when applying some changes may overwrite mod or vanilla settings
The size of the rendered lane connector overlay - the source or target lane circle
The width of the rendered lane connector overlay
Resets style settings to the mod defaults
Displays all lane connections along with their associated priority settings when editing intersection priorities
Traffic.Tooltip.Tools[LaneConnector][Sel: Select Connector to Add or Remove Connection
Traffic.Tooltip.Tools[LaneConnector][UTu: U-Turn track connections are not allowed!
Traffic.Tooltip.Tools[FeedbackMessage][W: [Traffic] Entering Lane Connection modification mode will remove Forbidden maneuvers from connected roads
[Traffic] Applying Forbidden maneuver upgrade will reset Lane connections at a nearby intersection
[Traffic] Applying Traffic Lights upgrade will reset Priority settings at the selected intersection
[Traffic] Applying Roundabout upgrade will reset Priority settings at the selected intersection
[Traffic] Applying the change reset Priority settings at the selected intersection
[Traffic] Selecting this segment with Road Builder mod will reset Traffic settings at nearby intersections
Traffic.Tooltip.Tools[FeedbackMessage][E: [Traffic] Modifying lane connections at intersection with roundabout is not supported
[Traffic] Roundabout upgrade cannot be used at an intersection with non-standard lane connections
[Traffic] Modifying lane connections at a selected intersection is not supported
[Traffic] Modifying priority settings at a selected intersection is not supported
[Traffic] Remove traffic lights to modify priority settings at a selected intersection
Traffic.UI.Tooltip.MainButton: Modification provides additional tools that could help managing in-game traffic. At the moment the Lane Connector tool, more to come soon. If you have suggestions for new tools or improvements, feel free to comment on the mod forum thread or open a feature suggestion on the mod GitHub page
Traffic.UI.Tools[LaneConnector].Title: Lane Connector Tool
Traffic.UI.Tools[Priorities].Title: Priorities Tool
Traffic.UI.Tools[LaneConnector].Descript: Manage lane connection at selected intersection
Traffic.UI.Tools[Priorities].Description: Manage lane priorities at selected intersection
Removes lane connections that can be configured by the Lane Connector tool. It doesn't touch two-way lane connections, since they are not supported yet.
Removes U-Turns from the selected intersection, applies only to U-turns on the same segment

Removes Unsafe lane connections from the selected intersection.
Unsafe lane is a lane with a higher pathfinding penalty, meaning that lane connection has a lower selection priority when other options are available
Traffic.UI.Tools[CurrentTool].Toolbox.Ac: Resets settings made with the current tool at the selected intersection to vanilla configuration
Traffic.UI.Tools[Priorities].Toolbox.Act: Highest priority, but may still give way to trams

Give way to other traffic coming from roads with higher priority.
If you notice dashed outline it means that priority setting makes no sense - there is no other traffic to give way
Stop at stop line and give way other traffic coming from roads with higher priority
Resets selected lane or lane group to vanilla default settings

Toggle between apply modes
Mode "Lane" allows for managing priority of individual lanes, while "Lane Group" applies the priority setting to lanes leading to the same road
